siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt:
All variables are defined in the data source settings. If you want to add, remove or edit variables you’ll need to go to
data sources and do the changes there.
markdownRemark.html: All variables are defined in the data source settings. If you want to add, remove or edit variables you’ll need to go to data sources and do the changes there.
